concept.shortdesc: The first two letters of the key form indicate the form that key type 1 parameter is in, and the second two letters indicate the form that key type 2 parameter is in.

conbody.codeblock:
Key Type Type Form 1 2
OPIM DATA DATA Use the OP form in . Use with the OP form to communicate ciphertext and key with another cryptographic partner. Use at a later time to use or with the same key again. OPIM MAC MAC Single-length key. Use the OP form in . You have no corresponding verb MACVER key, but you can call the verb with the MAC key directly. Use the verb and then compute the MAC again using the verb, which compares the MAC it generates with the MAC supplied with the message and issues a return code indicating whether they compare.
